name: FindMe
description:
Emma Watson disappeared. You have been chosen to find her. 

Will you succeed ? The answer is on your hands ! Try to solve riddles in this giant paper chase ! 

Hello ! 

This game was made for the No shit Sherlock Jam.

To explain. We didn't wanted to  make a video game because everyone will do it ! So we thought about a paper chase on the internet ! This idea make us laugh and we thought it was original !

If you have any questions or you are stuck don't hesitate to send me an email at : leoheriste@gmail.com

The team is composed by 7 students in first year of Game Design in Bellecour Ecole, Lyon, France : 

- Kilian BAPTENDIER

- Mathis BRESSAUD

- Maxime DRIOT

- Charlotte FRIES

- Hugo LEANG

- Charlie MOREL 

- Léonard SAVIO

Hope you will enjoy the idea and our game !
